name: Ball Run - Dodgeball
description:
Stickman needs your help! He's been trapped in this weird dodge world.

Tilt your phone to escape from deadly falling balls or be crushed in this easy to learn yet hard to master game!
But be careful, this task might not be so easy as it looks like.

How long can you endure? Compete with your friends and the entire world with the leaderboards. Be the number one!
